description: Meet the tripod that can take your photography to a whole new level. Alta Pro is a bestselling and award-winning tripod unmatched flexibility and stability that enables more angle possibilities than ever before. With lightweight carbon fiber legs, Alta Pro 254CT is popular for those who need extreme flexibility minus a heavy weight. Its Instant Swivel Stop-n-lock (ISSL) system securely repositions the central column in one simple movement, in just a few seconds, while maintaining the tripod's balance and stability. Its innovative Multi-Angle Center Column allows users to move the central column from zero to 130 Degree angle in variable vertical and horizontal positions. This tripod includes the popular SBH-50 ball head.
title: VANGUARD Alta Pro Multi-Angle Tripod 254CB 50
